greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of divisors of n which are not greater than the squarefree kernel of n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
example: The squarefree kernel of 56 = 7 * 2^3 is 14 = 7*2 and the divisors <= 14 of 56 are {1, 2, 4, 7, 8, 14}, therefore a(56) = 1 + 2 + 4 + 7 + 8 + 14 = 36.
program: A007947(n) = factorback(factorint(n)[, 1]); \\ This function from _Andrew Lelechenko_
A073181(n) = sumdiv(n, d, d*(d<=A007947(n))); \\ _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 10 2017, after _Michel Marcus_'s code for A073183.
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 19 2002
